text: Passer rating (known as passing efficiency or pass efficiency in NCAA football) is a measure of how well a quarterback, or any other passer in American and Canadian football, played. Math is used to get the passer rating. To get a good passer rating, a quarterback needs to have a high number of good passes and touchdowns. A quarterback can get a bad passer rating if the quarterback has many interceptions. == Other websites == * NFL.com QB Rating Page * Online QB Rating Calculator. NFL formula. * Online passer rating calculator for NFL/CFL, NCAA and AFL formulas Category:American football Category:Canadian football Category:College football Category:National Football League
title: Passer rating
